titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to provide on call pay to certain civil service health-care personnel.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 9 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 4/21/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal pay provisions for health-care employees within the Veterans Administration to authorize the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to provide ten percent of the hourly overtime rate for on call pay to certain civil service health-care personnel.
